articles.description: While the new documentary Pele goes into detail never previously discussed by the 80-year-old in front of camera before, it is his physical condition that is perhaps the most telling story of all.
articles.content:
Brazil legend Pele cuts a frail figure in the new Netflix documentary focusing on his extraordinary career.
Released on Tuesday, the film Pele, codirected by David Tryhorn and Ben Nicholas, involves… [+2832 chars]

articles.author: Nathan Salt
articles.title: Man United: Rio Ferdinand urges Jesse Lingard to 'close the chapter' on his United career - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jesse Lingard, 28, secured a loan move to West Ham in the January window having fallen out of favour at Manchester United and he has impressed in east London having made an immediate impact.
articles.content:
Jesse Lingard needs to leave Manchester United for good this summer because he is 'too good to play second fiddle', insists Rio Ferdinand. 
Lingard secured a loan move to West Ham in January having … [+2878 chars]
